about.title: About Me
about.description: Web Developer with a passion for creating solutions that truly help businesses grow. I help entrepreneurs turn ideas into profitable websites and web applications.
about.detailedDescription: I run the YouTube channel Oliwier Markiewicz where I share knowledge about programming and online business. I also regularly publish articles on my blog about the latest trends in web development.
about.philosophy: I believe that a good application is not just code - it's business strategy, user psychology and perfect execution in one. That's why my clients don't just get beautiful websites, but above all tools for making money.

highlightedDescription.part3: a good application is not just code

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: From the first line of code to professional developer - learn my story and what motivates me to continuously grow.

opinions.title: Client Reviews
opinions.subtitle: What they say about my work

step1.title: Consultation & Needs Analysis
step1.description: At the beginning of our collaboration, I conduct a detailed consultation to understand your needs and business goals. As a website creator, I analyze the market, your competition, and target audience to deliver the best-tailored solutions.

step2.title: Design & Website Development
step2.description: Then I proceed to design the website. I create unique graphic designs that are both aesthetic and functional. I use the latest technologies to make your site modern and responsive. Every website I create is optimized for SEO, which increases its visibility in search results.

step3.title: Testing & Implementation
step3.description: Before the website goes live, I conduct thorough functionality tests on various devices and browsers. I make sure everything works flawlessly, then deploy the site to hosting, taking care of every detail.

step4.title: Local SEO
step4.description: I offer professional Google My Business optimization services that will help your company stand out in local search results. Through Google My Business profile optimization, you'll improve your business visibility in Google Maps and search engine, attract more customers, and increase website traffic.

step5.title: Training & Support
step5.description: After launching the site, I offer training on its operation and content management. I also provide ongoing technical support. I'm available to answer your questions and help with further site development and marketing activities.

mainOffer.title: I increase your profits by 40%
mainOffer.description: I don't make "pretty websites". I create money-making machines. My clients see an average 40% increase in sales within the first 3 months.

express.title: Express without compromise
express.description: While others promise "next month", I deliver a ready website in maximum 2 weeks. Without compromising quality.

zeroRisk.title: Zero risk
zeroRisk.description: 6 months support + 30 days money-back guarantee. You pay only when you're 100% satisfied.

header.title: But is it worth it?
header.subtitle: I understand your doubts. Here's the brutal truth:

benefits.benefit2: Professional website is an investment, not a cost
benefits.benefit4: Your time is worth more than you think
benefits.benefit6: One mistake can cost more than the entire website
